98031.name: Lifetime Discretionary Hours
98031.description: Discretionary hours exclude hours used for sleep, meals and hygiene.

source.name: Fogel (2000)
source.dataPublishedBy: Fogel, Robert W. 2000. The Fourth Great Awakening and the Future of Egalitarianism. Chicago, IL and London: University Of Chicago Press.

98032.name: Lifetime Work Hours
98032.description: Work hours include paid work, travel to and from work, and household chores.

source.name: Fogel (2000)
source.dataPublishedBy: Fogel, Robert W. 2000. The Fourth Great Awakening and the Future of Egalitarianism. Chicago, IL and London: University Of Chicago Press.

source.name: Fogel (2000)
